definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: But this year, their homecoming has been bittersweet.
sentences.chinese: 但今年他们回家的心情却是喜忧参半。

sentences.english: So far, China's efforts to rein in its roaring energy use have been mixed.
sentences.chinese: 目前为止，中国节能降耗努力所取得的成效喜忧参半。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact , the result that the computer brings to the art design is both worried and glad .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，电脑对于美术设计带来的结果是喜忧参半。

sentences.english: Some key indicators paint a mixed picture of the U.S. economy on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五，美国经济的几个关健指标令人喜忧参半。

sentences.english: She and her counterparts had mixed feelings about the price rise.
sentences.chinese: 王春丽和她的同行对价格上涨喜忧参半。

sentences.english: Investment in mining in Africa has a mixed history and we should learn from it.
sentences.chinese: 非洲的矿业投资史喜忧参半，我们须从中汲取教训。

sentences.english: Official efforts to lure manufacturers away from the coast have had mixed results.
sentences.chinese: 政府努力吸引制造企业迁离沿海地区，结果喜忧参半。

sentences.english: The data on how an economic downturn influences an individual’s health are surprisingly mixed.
sentences.chinese: 有关经济衰退影响个人健康的数据竟然喜忧参半。

sentences.english: There are both strong point and week point in teacher resource for adult education in high institutes.
sentences.chinese: 当前高校成教师资队伍的现状是喜忧参半。

sentences.english: In Africa, too, science for development has been a mixed story.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，科学促进发展也是一个喜忧参半的故事。

sentences.english: Real returns also appear to be mixed.
sentences.chinese: 实际收益似乎也是喜忧参半。

sentences.english: Currently, we are seeing a mixed picture in the international non-proliferation field.
sentences.chinese: 当前，国际防扩散形势喜忧参半。

sentences.english: Like his co-star LeBlanc, Perry has something of a chequered love life.
sentences.chinese: 就象雷布朗一样，派瑞的爱情生活也是喜忧参半。

definition: half/half and half/both ... and .../just as much ... as .../equally
to be expecting/to be with child
to come as no surprise/as expected
two simultaneous happy events in the family
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
not expected at the outset (idiom)/unforeseen/to be surprised by the turn of events
calligraphic flourish with many twists/fig. many twists and turns
